Model
Interface AgentDataAccessInterface

public interface AgentDataAccessInterface

This is an interface that the model should implement It describes every method which can be called by an agent

Method Summary
 void addToGrid(java.util.List<sim.util.Int2D> coords, java.lang.Object obj)
          This method adds the given Object to the grid, with it given coordinates If there's already a component to one the given coordinates, the existing Object will be erased
 void addToGridIfEmpty(java.util.List<sim.util.Int2D> coords, java.lang.Object obj)
          This method adds the given Object to the grid, with it given coordinates It won't erase a component if it already exists on a given coordinate
 boolean canHearTheFire(Agents.People ppl)
          This method tells if the given People can hear a Fire somewhere
 boolean canMakeOneStepFront(Agents.People ppl)
          This method tells if a given People can make one step front or not

          This method tells if a given People can make one step to a given Constants.Direction or not

          It checks if the given People can see an Exit or not
 boolean canSeeTheFire(Agents.People ppl)
          This method tells if the given People can see a Fire somewhere

          This method gives a list of coordinates that are what the given People can hear

          This method gives a list of coordinates that are what the given People can see
 java.util.List<Agents.People> getAudiblePeople(Agents.People ppl)
          It returns all people that the given People can hear, according to its abilities

          It returns the closest Fire that the given People can hear
 Agents.Fire getClosestVisibleFire(Agents.People ppl)
          It returns the closest Fire that the given People can see

          It returns all people that the given People can see, according to its abilities

          This method removes the given Object from the grid, located at the given coordinates

          This method is invoked when a people is screaming Then, it notifies every people who is in the scream's scope

getClosestVisibleFire

Agents.Fire getClosestVisibleFire(Agents.People ppl)
It returns the closest Fire that the given People can see

Parameters:
ppl - The observer People
Returns:
The closest visible Fire, or null value if there's not

                         Agents.People ppl)
This method tells if a given People can make one step to a given Constants.Direction or not

Parameters:

ppl - The subject People
Returns:

removeFromGrid

boolean removeFromGrid(java.util.List<sim.util.Int2D> coords,
                       java.lang.Object obj)
This method removes the given Object from the grid, located at the given coordinates

Parameters:
coords - The given coordinates
obj - The given Object to remove
Returns:
It returns false if the given Object was nowhere on the grid, or true

addToGrid

void addToGrid(java.util.List<sim.util.Int2D> coords,
               java.lang.Object obj)
This method adds the given Object to the grid, with it given coordinates If there's already a component to one the given coordinates, the existing Object will be erased

Parameters:
coords - The Object's coordinates
obj - The Object to add

addToGridIfEmpty

void addToGridIfEmpty(java.util.List<sim.util.Int2D> coords,
                      java.lang.Object obj)
This method adds the given Object to the grid, with it given coordinates It won't erase a component if it already exists on a given coordinate

Parameters:
coords - The Object's coordinates
obj - The Object to add

canSeeAnExit

Components.Exit canSeeAnExit(Agents.People ppl)
It checks if the given People can see an Exit or not

Parameters:
ppl - The subject of the action
Returns:
Either the seeable Exit object, either null value if no Exit can be seen
